key.name: debug
key.description: If true the extension will print verbosely to the log. See 'journalctl /usr/bin/gnome-shell -f -o cat' for output.

key.name: per-device-indicators
key.description: If true, show an indicator in the Status Area for each device. If false, devices will be available in the User Menu.

key.name: show-offline
key.description: If true, rememered devices will be shown in the interface even when they are offline.

key.name: show-untrusted
key.description: If true, devices will be shown in the interface even if they have not been marked trusted or formally paired.

key.name: start-daemon
key.description: If true the daemon will be automatically started and restarted if it stops. If false the extension will wait for the daemon to be started.

key.name: use-kdeconnect
key.description: Use KDE Connect as the backend, instead of MConnect.
